p.s: In this part of scene three of the play Disgraced, Scene 3, written by Ayad Akhtar and published in 2013, it comes to the peak.
After an intense dinner with Jory, Isaac, Emily and Amir Jory and Amir interrupt Emily and Isaac while kissing.
Jory asks her husband more than onesonce if they have an affair while Amir is just listening.
Emily denies the whole time that they kissed which makes Amir think Jory want to ruin his life even more after finding out she gets the job which he should get.
Amir holds a monologue and shouts to Jory.
Isaac confronts him indirect whereupon they have a stairdown on which end Amir spits him in his face.
The first one who leaves is Isaac the second one Jory.

Emily brings Amir a coffee while he thinks about the words which Jory said and his job, but when she comes back he confronts her and she tells him the truth about her one night stand a few years ago in London with Isaac.
After hearing the truth Amir loses control and hits Emily a few times in her face.
Just when he realizes what he has done Abe comes in and sees the blood in EmilysEmily's face.
He looks up to Amir and the lights go out.
